snippet: Ann Pettway, accused of kidnapping the 3-week-old Carlina White from Harlem Hospital in 1987, will plead guilty to an unspecified charge on Friday, a court document shows.
abstract: Ann Pettway, accused of kidnapping the 3-week-old Carlina White from Harlem Hospital in 1987, will plead guilty to an unspecified charge on Friday, a court document shows.

headline.main: Woman Charged With 1987 Baby Kidnapping to Plead Guilty
headline.print_headline: Woman to Plead Guilty in ’87 Infant Kidnapping in Harlem
